amendment.description: An amendment numbered 86 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funds to finalize, implement, administer, or enforce the CFPB's rule entitled "Registry of Nonbank Covered Persons Subject to Certain Agency and Court Orders".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.
